Pages.Name: env_screenoverlay
Pages.Description: An entity that can display and control a set of screen overlays, to be displayed over the player's view. Useful for view effects like drunkenness, or teleporter afterimages, etc.

Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
Name of the first overlay material to display.
Amount of time that the first overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the second overlay.
Name of the second overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the second overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the third overlay.
Name of the third overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the third overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the fourth overlay.
Name of the fourth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the fourth overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the fifth overlay.
Name of the fifth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the fifth overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the sixth overlay.
Name of the sixth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the sixth overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the seventh overlay.
Name of the seventh overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the seventh overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the eighth overlay.
Name of the eighth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the eighth overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the ninth overlay.
Name of the ninth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the ninth overlay should be displayed for, after which it will begin showing the tenth overlay.
Name of the tenth overlay material to display. If left blank, overlay displaying will finish, and this entity will consider itself done.
Amount of time that the tenth overlay should be displayed for, after which this entity will stop displaying overlays.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: StartOverlays
InputOutputs.Description: Start displaying the first overlay.

InputOutputs.Name: StopOverlays
InputOutputs.Description: Stop displaying any overlays.

InputOutputs.Name: SwitchOverlay
InputOutputs.Description: Switch to displaying a specific overlay. Pass in the desired overlay number in the parameter.
